clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for cleansing of the colon as a preparation for colonoscopy in adults

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Bisacodyl is hydrolyzed by intestinal brush border enzymes and colonic bacteria to form an active metabolite bis p hydroxyphenyl pyridyl 2 methane BHPM that acts directly on the colonic mucosa to produce colonic peristalsis
